create-request.description-text: Here you can create a new dispatch order. After you have created a dispatch order, you can view it in the list of your dispatch orders, edit it and then release it for dispatch.
create-request.successfully-requested-text: The dispatch order has been created successfully. You can now edit it in the next step.

show-requests.description-text: Here you can view the list of all your created dispatch orders and edit, delete or submit. You can also
show-requests.empty-date-submitted: This order has not been forwarded yet.
show-requests.delete-dialog-text: Do you really want to delete this dispatch order? Please note that this will also delete all saved attachments and recipients.
show-requests.delete-not-allowed-text: This action is no longer allowed for dispatch orders that have already been released.
show-requests.successfully-deleted-text: The dispatch order was successfully deleted.
show-requests.successfully-submitted-text: The dispatch order has been successfully submitted and will be dispatched.
show-requests.submit-dialog-text: Do you really want to release this dispatch order?
show-requests.empty-fields-submitted-text: Not all required fields have been completed or a file has not yet been uploaded for dispatch. Please complete your information and try again.
show-requests.back-to-list: Back to the list of all dispatch orders

error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
